data.text: @TaraSample1 The nose seems to have sorted itself out after some antihistamines and a nice lil neti pot. Waiting on the throat to figure itself out 🤔
@Kimbirdly_PhD Scratchy throat and sniffly nose turned out to be COVID for us.
@_olivebean RIGHT??? Currently trying to remember scratchy throats of colds and flus past...is this just aggravated? Is this the feel the day before it became Sore Throat? 😬😬😬

Pretty sure it's the latter on both those, but the number of people who straight up STARED at me in Morro Bay and Paso Robles for wearing a mask inside doesn't make me confident in there not being COVID floating around happily there...
